programme.title: Na paranormalnom zadatku
programme.desc: Nestaje ključni član tajne vladine agencije pa ga cinični detektiv Leroy i genijalac Max koji vjeruje u paranormalno moraju pronaći dok otkrivaju moguću izvanzemaljsku aktivnost. Nestaje ključni član tajne vladine agencije pa ga cinični detektiv Leroy i genijalac Max koji vjeruje u paranormalno moraju pronaći dok otkrivaju moguću izvanzemaljsku aktivnost i "neobjašnjene" paranormalne događaje u Los Angelesu.

programme.title: Na paranormalnom zadatku
programme.desc: Nema kapetanice LaFrey pa Annie instalira šarmantnu umjetnu inteligenciju zvanu Sam da vodi agenciju, ali Max i Leroy otkrivaju da je Sam zla i moćna sila koja želi uništiti Podzemnu agenciju. Max je... Nema kapetanice LaFrey pa Annie instalira šarmantnu umjetnu inteligenciju zvanu Sam da vodi agenciju, ali Max i Leroy otkrivaju da je Sam zla i moćna sila koja želi uništiti Podzemnu agenciju. Max je ljubomoran na Leroyeva novog prijatelja.

credits.actor: Cate Blanchett, George Clooney, Tobey Maguire, Jack Thompson, Dominic Comperatore
Bred Pit, Edvard Norton, Helena Bonam Karter, Mit Loaf, Jared Leto, Zach Grenier, Richmond Arquette, David Andrews

programme.title: Para gjaku
programme.desc: 2012. Një vrasës tepër i aftë me një të kaluar të errët, e gjen veten në mes të një lufte të egër midis grupeve kriminale sekrete të Hong Kongut dhe tregtarëve të mëdhenj kolumbianë të drogës.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Gara e hakmarrjes
programme.desc: Jackie Chan. Jackie Chan. Pasi ndihmon heroikisht policinë të arrestojë liderin e garave të paligjshme me makina të Hong Kongut, Foh, një mekanik i thjeshtë, duhet të përballet me të në një garë vendimtare, pasi ai arratiset nga burgu.
programme.category: Aksion
sport
krim

programme.title: Kundërgrushti
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Një boksier i ri, nga lagjet e varfëra të Majemit, me ëndrrën për të fituar Kampionatin e Dorezave të Arta, e gjen veten në udhekryq pasi diagnostifikohet me sëmundjen e bipolaritetit.
programme.category: Aksion
sport

programme.title: Pushtimi i fundit
programme.desc: Pas rrëzimit të një anijeje jashtëtokësore ne vitin 1947, një skuadër e specialzuar krijohet për të mbrojtur njerëzit. Por jashtëtokësorët sulmojnë 66 vjet më pasdhe pjestarët e skuadrës të dalë në pension, janë shpresa e vetme për shpëtim.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Engjëlli i vdekjes
programme.desc: Steven Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind.Elijah Kane, dhe skuadra e tij po gjurmojnë dy pajisje nukleare që janë futur ilegalisht dhe kërkohen të blihen nga një kriminel. Por sa më shumë i afrohen gjetjes, aq më i rrezkishëm bëhet misioni.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Hirokin: Samurai i fundit
programme.desc: Wes Bentley, Jessica Szohr, Angus Macfadyen. Në një planet ku njerëzit janë të nënshtruar, Hirokin një samurai me një të kaluar të errët, ndërmerr një mision të rrezikshëm për të përmbushur fatin e tij...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Spiunët e Varshavës Pj. 2
programme.desc: David Tennant, Janet Montgomery. Në prag të Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një atashe ushtarak në ambasadën franceze në Varshavë, fillon një romancë të zjarrtë, por përfshihet edhe në një botë spiunazhi dhe tradhtish.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Forcat e ndërhyrjes së shpejtë
programme.desc: Ray Winstone, Ben Drew. Bazuar në serialin anglez mjaft të suksesshëm të viteve 1970. Një skuadër e policisë së Londrës, përdor të njëjtat taktika brutale si dhe kriminelët, për t'ju dhënë ndëshkimin e merituar.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: 6 plumba
programme.desc: Një mercenar (Jean-Claude Van Damme), specialiteti i të cilit është gjetja e fëmijëve të zhdukur, punësohet nga një kampion i arteve marciale (Joe Flanigan) që i kanë rrëmbyer vajzën...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Skuadra Bishtkuqët
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr., Gerald McRaney. Gjatë Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një grup pilotësh afrikano-amerikanë, duhet të luftojnë dy beteja në të njëjtën kohë: atë me armikun dhe diskriminimin racial.
programme.category: Aksion
luftë

programme.title: Legjenda e shpellës së arit
programme.desc: Një qiraxhi misterioz në fermën e një vejusheje, lidhet fort me djalin e saj të vogël, ndërsa i tregon atij histori nga Perëndimi i Vjetër. Por përrallat me aventurat e harruara, bëhen tepër reale kur një i huaj shfaqet në kërkim të një thesari të humbur.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Konvergjenca
programme.desc: Një dektektiv policie dërgohet në një spital thuajse të zbrazët pasi plagoset në një sulm terrorist. Atje, i vetëm, ai duhet të përballet me armiq të një tjeter lloji ndërsa lufton të zbulojë identitetin e terroristit para se të jetë tepër vonë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Largo Uinç 2
programme.desc: Tomer Sisley, Sharon Stone. Ditën që deklaroi shitjen e aksioneve për të ngritur një organizatë humanitare, trashëgimtari i një prej korporatave me të fuqishme, akuzohet për krime kundër njerëzimit...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Sulm i papritur
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren, Vinnie Jones, Randy Couture. Ndërkohë që agjent special e DEA, përgatitet për të arrestuar një bos të drogës, një polic i korruptuar është i gatshëm të luftojë si të mundet për të vazhduar jetën e tij të dyfishtë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: 1847-ta e zezë
programme.desc: Irlandë, 1847. Kur Zia e Madhe e Bukës shkatërron familjen dhe vendlindjen e tij, një ushtar irlandez që luftonte për Perandorinë Britanike, dezerton ushtrinë dhe kërkon hakmarrje ndaj tiranëve përgjegjës.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë

programme.title: Osirisi:Planet i 9-të
programme.desc: Në një të ardhme kur kolonozimi njerëzor është zgjeruar në planete të tjera, një ushtarak në garë me kohën do të bëjë një aleancë të pazakontë për të shpëtuar vajzën e tij dhe vetë njërëzimin, nga një virus vdekjeprurës.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Pranë armikut
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme. Thellë në kufirin Kanada - ShBA, dy armiq të betuar duhet të bashkojnë forcat për t'i shpëtuar një bande të pamëshirshme, të cilët po kërkojnë ngarkesën e drogës që është zhdukur pranë asaj zone.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Forca e veprimit
programme.desc: Steven Steven Seagal,Darren Shahlavi.Elijah Kane ivihet pas një njeriu, i cili ka ardhur në qytet për të mbrojtur armikun numër 1 të tij. Përmes tij, ai mund të kapë objektivin dhe t'i japë fund dhunës njëherë e përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Plumbi i vrasësit
programme.desc: Christian Slater, Donald Sutherland, Elika Portnoy. Dikush po zhduk një e nga një terroristët me prioritet të lartë të qeverisë amerikane dhe ish agjenti i F.B.I-së, Robert Diggs, ngarkohet me misionin e vështirë të zbulimit të së vërtetës.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Harresë
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman. Në të ardhmen, kur Toka është shkatërruar nga nje racë jashtëtokësorësh, Xhek Harper - veteran i ngarkuar me misionin e nxjerrjes së burimeve të mbetura nga toka, fillon të dyshojë për misionin dhe veten e tij.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Renegatët e Beitaunit
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton, Eva Longoria. Tre vëllezër famëkeq nga Alabama më në fund vendosin të kryejnë një vepër të mirë, por do t'i hapin vetes shumë telashe me policë të korruptuar e gangsterë të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Huliganët 3
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Kacey Clarke. Pasi vëllai i tij vritet në një dyluftim artesh marciale të jashtëligjshëm, një huligan futet në te njëjtin rrjet me qëllim që të hakmerret për vdekjen e tij.
programme.category: Aksion/Arte marciale

programme.title: Prekja e D-së
programme.desc: Mark Ruffalo, Orlando Bloom. Pasi një aksident e lë në karrige me rrota, një Di Xhei mëson se zotëron dhuntinë për të shëruar njerëz, por jo veten. A do ta përdorë ai këtë aftësi për famë dhe para apo do ta vendosë në shërbim të të tjerëve?
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Buda i vogël
programme.desc: K.Reeves, B.Fonda, C.Isaak. Lama Norbu vjen në Siatell të kërkojë mësuesin e tij të rimishëruar, Lama Doxhe. Aty përzgjedh 3 fëmijë. Bashke me ta nis udhëtimi drejt Butanit, ku femijet do te testohen se kush është Buda i rimisheruar.
programme.category: Dramë
aventurë

programme.title: Havana, qyteti i humbur
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2005. Filmi i parë si regjisor i Andy Garcia-s. Ndryshimet e mëdha në Kubën e viteve 1950, përfshijnë në vorbullën e tyre një pronar lokali nate dhe familjen e tij, që rrezikon të përçahet përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Provo të fluturosh
programme.desc: Riccardo Scamarcio, Alessandra Mastronardi. Një djalë 20 vjeçar dhe një vajzë adoleshente, secili të përballur me probleme të ndryshme, arratisen së bashku, në përpjekje për të zbuluar vetveten dhe për të filluar një jetë të re.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Dy të dashuruar dhe një ari polar
programme.desc: Dan DeHaan, Tatiana Maslany. Në një qytezë të izoluar afër Polit të Veriut, Romani dhe Lusi, dy shpirtra të trazuar, bëjnë një përpjekje të fundit për të gjetur së bashku lumturinë dhe paqen e brendshme.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Paqe, dashuri dhe keqkuptim
programme.desc: Catherine Keener, Jane Fonda. Në prag të divorcit, një avokate kokëfortë dhe dy femijet e saj, ndërmarrin një udhëtim për të vizituar nënën e saj hipi, të cilën ajo nuk e ka parë prej shumë vitesh...
programme.category: Drame
komedi

programme.title: Xhepi i Perëndisë
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman. Kur përpiqet të fshehë vdekjen askidentale të thjeshtrit, një njeri e gjen veten në një trekëndësh të rrezikshëm mes trupit që s'mund ta varrosë, gruas që s'mund t'i plotësojë dëshirat dhe një borxhi që s'e paguan dot.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Iluzionet e së tashmes
programme.desc: Miles Teller, Shailene Woodley. Adoleshenti më popullor i shkollës, bie në dashuri me një vajzë që nuk vihej re nga askush... Ç'ka fillon si një romancë e pazakontë, kthehet në një pasqyrim të dilemave dhe pasioneve të rinisë...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Magjia e Belle Isle
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman. Nje shkrimtari të njohur, për shkak të luftës së tij me alkoolin, i ka humbur dëshira për të shkruar. Vendos që të shkojë për pak kohë në Belle Isle. Miqesia me komshinjtë e rinj do ta frymëzojë përsëri.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Udhëzues dashurie
programme.desc: Carlo Verdone, Luciana Littizzetto, Silvio Muccino, Margherita Buy. Historitë e ndërthurura të katër çifteve, mbi gëzimet dhe hidhërimet e dashurisë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Fytyra e dashurisë
programme.desc: Annette Bening, Ed Harris, Robin Williams. Një grua e ve, fillon një romancë me një burrë që ngjason shumë me ish bashkëshortin e saj...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Të magjepsësh zemrat e burrave
programme.desc: Në fillim të viteve '60, një grua e divorcuar kthehet në vendlindje, në jug të Shteteve të Bashkuara dhe kupton se gratë, pa mbeshtjetjen e burrave, nuk kanë asnjë fuqi. E vendosur të ndryshojë situatën, me ndihmën e një aleati të kongresit, ajo do të ndr.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë
histori

programme.title: Pirati Asanzh
programme.desc: Bazuar në jetën e themeluesit të organizatës "Wikileaks", Julian Asange . Në vitin 1989, ai arriti të hyjë në serverat e organizatave më të fuqishme në botë. Ishte i ri, i zgjuar dhe në sytë e Amerikës, kërcënim për sigurinë kombëtare...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Turpi
programme.desc: John Malkovich, Jessica Haines. Pas një lidhjeje seksuale me një studente, një profesor në Afrikën e Jugut, shkon të gjejë paqe në fermën e vajzës së tij, por do të përballet me trazirat dhe pasojat që erdhën pas periudhës së Aparteidit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Malet mes nesh
programme.desc: Idris Elba, Kate Winslet. Të bllokuar në mal pas një aksidenti me avion, dy të panjohur bashkëpunojnë për t'i mbijetuar kushteve ekstreme të moti.
programme.category: Romancë
thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Një kufomë për mbijetesë
programme.desc: Paul Dano, Daniel Radcliffe. Një njeri i bllokuar në një ishull të shkretuar, gjen në breg kufomën e një njeriu dhe fillon bashkë me të një rrugëtim të jashtëzakonshëm për t'u rikthyer në shtëpi.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Shpejtësi maksimale
programme.desc: S. Eastwood. Endrju dhe Garet Foster janë shoferë të shkëlqyer, por edhe hajdutët më të mirë të makinave. Ata grabisin një 'Bugati' të rrallë nga një bos mafioz. Bosi tenton që talentin e tyre ta përdorë kundër një rivali, por djemtë kanë tjetër plan.
programme.category: Aksion/ Thriller

programme.title: 47 metra nën det: Të pambrojtu
programme.desc: 2019. Katër vajza adoleshente që zhyten në një qytet të lashtë të përmbytur, mësojnë shpejt se kanë hyrë në territorin e specieve më vdekjeprurëse të peshkaqenëve, ndërsa notojnë në larbirintet klaustrofobike të shpellave nënujore.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Brahms: Djali II
programme.desc: Katie Holmes. Pasi një familje zhvendoset në rezidencën "Heelshire", djali i tyre shumë shpejt miqësohet me një kukull të quajtur Brahms.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Lamtumirë Franceze
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer, Lucas Hedges. Një grua e ve, pjesë e shoqërisë së lartë të Manhatanit, mbledh paratë e fundit që i kanë mbetur nga trashëgimia e burrit dhe transferohet në Paris me djalin dhe macen e saj.
programme.category: Komedi
Dramë

programme.title: Barbi dhe Stari në Vista del Mar
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Annie Mumolo. Barb dhe Star, dy 40-vjeçare, mike të një jete, largohen për hertë të parë nga qyteti i tyre i vogël për të shkuar në vendpushimin 'Vista.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Njeriu që shpiku Krishtlindjet
programme.desc: Duke marrë frymëzim nga atmosfera e Londrës, Çarls Dikens nis të shkurajë novelën që ndryshoi përgjithmonë mënyrën e festimit të Kishtlindjes. Ky është rrugëtimi magjik që e çoi në krimjimin e novelës 'Këngë Krishtlindjesh'.
programme.category: Biografi
Dramë

programme.title: Një natë për qejf
programme.desc: Lisa Kudrow, Kaitlyn Dever, Beanie Feldstein. Emi dhe Molli kuptojnë se duhet të kishin mësuar më pak dhe të ishin argëtuar më shumë gjatë gjimnazit. Në prag të diplomimit, ato vendosin të festojnë brenda një nate, sa për 4 vjet gjimnazi...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Një djalë i ri, i lindur me fuqi unike dhe i destinuar për të sjellë shkatërrim në botë, duhet të gjejë një mënyrë për t'ju kundërvënë profecisë dhe të bëhet hero.
programme.category: Vizatimor
aksion

programme.title: Amaneti
programme.desc: Bruce Willis. Paul Kersey është një kirurg i cili ndërgjëgjësohet për dhunën në qytetin e tij, vetëm kur gruaja dhe vajza e tij sulmohen në shtëpine e tyre. Me policinë të mbingarkuar nga krimet, ai nis të vendosë vetë drejtësi.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Papijon
programme.desc: Charlie Hunnam, Rami Malek. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. I dënuar gabimisht për vrajse, Henri Charriere lidh një aleancë të pazakontë me të dënuarin për falsifikim Luis Dega-n, në përpjekje për t'u arratisur nga burgu famëkeq në Ishullin e Djallit..
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Shoku ynë
programme.desc: Jason Segel, Dakota Johnson, Casey Affleck. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë dhe të jashtëzakonshme. Pas marrjes së një lajmi tronditës, një çift gjen mbështetjen e papritur të shokut të tyre të ngushtë, i cili vendos jetën e tij në pritje dhe zhvendoset.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: Hilary Swank. Jeta përsosur e një agjenti sportiv të martuar, shkatërrohet kur zbulon se gruaja seksi dhe misterioze me të cilën kaloi një natë pasionante, është një detektive këmbëngulëse që e ngatërron atë në hetimin e saj të fundit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Gëzuar Ditën e Vdekjes
programme.desc: Një studente fillon të ripërjetojë ditën e vrasjes së saj, dhe e vetmja mënyrë për të ndalur horrorin është të zbulojë identitetin e vrasësit.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Pas cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni xhirimet e prapaskenave te filmit.
programme.category: Shooter

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: 2017. Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart. Në të ardhmen e afërt, Logan i lodhur nga vite luftimesh e arratie, kujdeset për profesorin X në fshehtësi. Por bota e tyre kthehet përmbys kur një vajzë e re mutante kërkon ndihmën e tyre për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Lumturia më bën keq
programme.desc: Martin Freeman. Çarli vuan nga një sëmundje që i shkakton gjendje të fikti sa herë përjeton emocione të forta, në veçanti lumturi. Ai i ka mësuar vetes të refuzojë çdo gjë që i jep kënaqësi, por gjithçka sprovohet kur bie në dashuri...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Biznes Zonjash
programme.desc: Salma Hayek, Tiffany Haddish, Rose Byrne. Miqësia e dy shoqeve të ngushta lëkundet kur një mogul famëkeq i industrisë së bukurisë, i josh ato që të shesin kompaninë e tyre të kozmetikës.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dhoma e arratisjes
programme.desc: Gjashtë të panjohur joshen të marrin pjesë në lojën 'Dhoma e arratisjes', por e gjejnë veten në situata përtej kontrollit të tyre. Ata duhet të përdorin zgjuarsinë për të zgjidhur të dhënat e lojës, në të kundërt do të vdesin.
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Labirinti 3: Kura e vdekjes
programme.desc: Në përmbyllje të sagës, Tomas udhëheq grupin e tij drejt misionit final. Për të shpëtuar miqtë e tyre, ata duhet të gjejnë një mënyrë që të hyjnë në labirintin legjendar 'Qyteti i fundit', më i rrezikshmi nga të gjithë larbirintët!
programme.category: Fantashkence
Aksion

programme.title: Grerëza jeshile
programme.desc: Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz.; Pasi trashëgon komaninë e madhe të babait që sapo ka ndërruar jetë, një njeri bashkon forcat me shoferin e tij dhe së bashku shndërrohen në dy superheronj të maskuar që luftojnë krimin...
programme.category: Komedi
aksion

programme.title: 40 vjeç beqare
programme.desc: Ashley Judd, Patrick Wilson. Në një qytezë në Virxhinian e vitit 1978, nje 40 vjeçare beqare e ka pranuar se ndoshta s'do të gjejë kurrë njeriun e duhur. Por një sekret familjar shumëvjeçar do t'i ndryshojë jetën përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Romancë
komedi

programme.title: Zotëria i nderuar
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit: 1992. Eddie Murphy. Një kriminel nga Florida shfrytëzon kartën e identitetit të një senatori me të cilin ndan të njejtin emër. I futet rrugës së politikës, por me të gjetur dashurinë, i duhet të dalë prej saj, por s'është kollaj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean bën vetë çdo gjë
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Mr. Bean rikthehet në shkollë
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: 102 vjeçari që synonte Ginesin
programme.desc: Një 102-vjeçar indian që synon të bëhet njëriu më jetëgjatë, kërkon të bëjë një jetë pa strese që të thyejë rekordin. Por i biri 75-vjeçar që i është dorëzuar pleqërisë, ia vështirëson punën....
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Heroi i kafshëve
programme.desc: Kevin James, Rosario Dawson. Kafshët e një kopshti zoologjik, vendosin të zbulojnë se mund të flasin me njerëzit, në mënyrë që të ndihmojnë kujdestarin e tyre për të gjetur dashurinë dhe për të mos u larguar për një punë tjetër 'më të mirë'.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ushtari Megan
programme.desc: Jessica Simpson, Vivica Fox, Steve Guttenberg. Një aktore e famshme, humbet pothuajse gjithçka brenda ditës. Në përpjekje për të ndryshuar jetën e saj, ajo regjistrohet në ushtri. Por në kampin e stërvitjes, fama nuk të hyn aspak në punë.
programme.category: Bjonde dhe e rrezikshme

programme.title: Tre burra dhe një këmbë
programme.desc: Tre shoke ndermarrin nje udhetim perpara dites se dasmes per te kryer nje porosi te vjehrrit. Kjo porosi eshte nje kembe druri e cila do t'ju hape nje mal me telashe.
programme.category: Aldo
Giovanni e Giacomo

programme.title: Moderne dhe gënjeshtare
programme.desc: Isla Fisher, Hugh Dancy. Një vajzë që nuk u reziston dot blerjeve nëpër dyqane dhe është e mbytur në borxhe, fillon punë si gazetare në një revistë, ku i duhet të shkruajë sesi të kursesh para nga blerjet e tepërta...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Me ty gjithçka është e bukur
programme.desc: Miqtë e fëmijërisë Deniz dhe Emre premtuan se nëse do të ishin beqarë deri në moshën 30-vjeçare, do të martoheshin me njëri-tjetrin. Kur Emre shpall martesën pak ditë para 30-vjetorit, Deniz betohet të ndalojë dasmën me çdo kusht!
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Sa e ke numrin?
programme.desc: Anna Faris, Chris Evans. Një vajzë beson se shansi për të gjetur njeriun perfekt tashmë ka kaluar. E bindur se ndoshta njëri prej ish të dashurve është i duhuri, ajo përpiqet t'i takojë sërish për t'i dhënë vetes një mundësi të dytë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Planeti Terror
programme.desc: Rose McGowan, Josh Brolin. Pasi një armë biokimike eksperimentale testohet mbi popullatën dhe shumica e njerëzve kthehen në zombi, një grup të mbijetuarish duhet të bëjnë të pamundurën për të ndalur të infektuarit dhe njerëzit përgjegjës.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Shtëpia e heshtur
programme.desc: Elizabeth Olsen, Adam Trese. Një vajzë e re bllokohet brenda shtëpisë së familjes së saj, që sulmohet nga forca të mbinatyrshme me energji misterioze e me pasoja të frikshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Uria
programme.desc: 1983. Sara Roberts, një studiuese e simptomave të plakjes është në rrezik sepse gjendet nën shenjestrën e Urisë. John Blaylock...Uria i ka dhënë atij pavdekësinë. Miriam, gruaja e tij koleksionon objekte arti, dashnorë, shpirtra...
programme.category: Classic Horror

programme.title: 88 minuta
programme.desc: Al Pacino. Xhek Gram, profesor dhe psikolog mjeko-ligjor, do të marrë një telefonatë, ku i thuhet se ka edhe 88 minuta jetë para se të vritet. Tani, atij i duhet të përdorë të gjitha aftësitë për të zbardhur misterin perpara se të jetë vonë.
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: Stacioni
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg. Pas 4 vitesh burg, një njeri i pafajshëm po kthehet në shtëpi. Gjithçka që ai do është një fillim në rrugë të mbarë. Por tani ka zbuluar një sekret që kërcënon familjen më të pamëshirshme në qytet...familjen e vet.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Ngjyra e krimit
programme.desc: Samuel J.Jackson. Dedektivi Lorenzo Council do te hetojë mbi rrëmbimin e djalit të Brenda Martin-it. Gjatë hetimit, del se i dyshuari është njeri me ngjyrë dhe ky fakt do të nxisë reagime të egra të bashkesise me ngjyrë të qytetit.
programme.category: Krim
dramë

programme.title: Xhesi Stoun Det dyshimesh
programme.desc: Tom Sellec. Një vrasje e dyfishtë detyron ish-sherifin e qytezës së Parajsës të lërë pensionin e t'i kthehet detyrës. Në këtë çështje të rrethuar nga një mori gjurmësh çorientuese, atij i mbetet vetëm të mbështetet tek eksperienca e tij.
programme.category: Krim
thriller\t

programme.title: Këneta
programme.desc: Diana Glenn, Maeve Dermody, Andy Rodoreda. Bazuar në një ngjarje të vërtetë! Tre njerëz do të përjetojnë makthin më të madh të jetës, kur izolohen nga një krokodil gjigant në një kënetë të Australisë së Veriut.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Ne vdesim të rinj
programme.desc: 2019.Jean Claude Van Damme. Një 14-vjeçar i përfshirë në bandën më të rrezikshme latine në Uashington, është i vendosur që vëllai i tij i vogël të mos ndjekë të njëjtën rrugë. Kur një veteran lufte vjen në lagjen e tyre, një mundësi lind për ta.
programme.category: Krim
aksion

programme.title: Takim me djallin
programme.desc: Luke Wilson, Samuel L. Jackson. Pasi Xhon, humbet punën e tij, pranon të ndihmojë një te panjohur, me makinën e tij. Që nga ky çast jeta e tij do të kthehet në një makth. Në një botë surreale, e cila do ti vërë në dyshim gjithçka.
programme.category: Krim
mister

programme.title: Kthimi
programme.desc: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Peter O'Brien, Adam Scott, Kate Beahan. Joana Mills, një grua e suksesshme, papritur fillon të ketë vizione lidhur me vrasjen e një gruaje... Ajo vendos të hetojë krimin, por zbulon shumë sekrete.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Blloku 31
programme.desc: Disa muaj pasi bëhen dëshmitarë të një vrasjeje, banorët e një pallati fillojnë të eliminohen nga një snajper dhe nëse nuk zbulojnë se nga vijnë të shtënat, askush nuk do të dalë gjallë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
Hemingway i Gellhorn
programme.desc: Hemingway & Gellhorn: Directed by Philip Kaufman. With Nicole Kidman, Clive Owen, David Strathairn, Rodrigo Santoro. A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0423455/","name":"Hemingway & Gellhorn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1OTM3OTY0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTY4MDU4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CryptoGuy"},"dateCreated":"2012-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Shallow Attempt","reviewBody":"I was really disappointed in this movie. The build up and anticipation for it was great. I had high expectations. With Clive Owen and Nicole Kidman leading the charge, it was Kaufman's to screw up, and screw it up he did.\n\nThe characters were shallow, but they fit right in with the ankle deep script. I thought the historic film gimmick was overplayed and laughable at times. Clive Owen tried his hardest to bring life to Stahl and Turner's straw-man. Hemingway never had any real motive and when it appeared that he might, it was abandoned. Nicole Kidman did a fine job as well, but it had to be long days and frustrating nights with the stiff dialogue. The supporting cast was lifeless, filled with assumptions, and caricatures of an era. Watching this film was like watching an artist that promised to paint you a masterpiece then he pulled out a mop. This was sloppy film-making and it started with the script and ended with the director. A poor showing for such a rich subject.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9450,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-05-28","keywords":"war correspondent,writer,divorce,winter war,spanish civil war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0331056/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0821466/","name":"Jerry Stahl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193009/","name":"Barbara Turner"}],"duration":"PT2H35M"}</script><metacontent="

A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0423455/","name":"Hemingway & Gellhorn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1OTM3OTY0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTY4MDU4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423455/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CryptoGuy","dateCreated":"2012-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Shallow Attempt","reviewBody":"I was really disappointed in this movie. The build up and anticipation for it was great. I had high expectations. With Clive Owen and Nicole Kidman leading the charge, it was Kaufman's to screw up, and screw it up he did.\n\nThe characters were shallow, but they fit right in with the ankle deep script. I thought the historic film gimmick was overplayed and laughable at times. Clive Owen tried his hardest to bring life to Stahl and Turner's straw-man. Hemingway never had any real motive and when it appeared that he might, it was abandoned. Nicole Kidman did a fine job as well, but it had to be long days and frustrating nights with the stiff dialogue. The supporting cast was lifeless, filled with assumptions, and caricatures of an era. Watching this film was like watching an artist that promised to paint you a masterpiece then he pulled out a mop. This was sloppy film-making and it started with the script and ended with the director. programme.title: Chelsea Handler: Evolution
Chelsea Handler: Evolucija
programme.desc:
Chelsea Handler: Evolution: Directed by Troy Miller. With Chelsea Handler. Chelsea Handler is back and better than ever - and not just because she started going to therapy and consuming cannabis. Marking her much-anticipated return to stand-up after six years, Chelsea Handler: Evolution finds the trailblazing comedian in her home state of New Jersey, fresh off the national tour of her latest New York Times #1 bestselling memoir, and at the top of her game. Evolution is her most candid, intimate material to date. Intertwining hilarious and brutally honest stories about her family, friends, and her first foray into therapy, Handler reflects on her personal journey toward self-awareness, reminding audiences why she's one of the most successful and outspoken voices in comedy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12736220/","name":"Chelsea Handler: Evolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNkZDEwYmYtMmJlNS00YTA1LTkyMzItNTQzM2M5MmYxZjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Chelsea Handler is back and better than ever - and not just because she started going to therapy and consuming cannabis. Marking her much-anticipated return to stand-up after six years, Chelsea Handler: Evolution finds the trailblazi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12736220/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny, wholesome, vulnerable, awesome.","reviewBody":"I've always been a fan of Handler, but this stand-up wasn't what I expected.

Nothing is better than a comedy where you talk about your hilarious life's events, but Handler also showed her vulnerability with a sad story about someone (no spoilers) close to her that I never new about. For a comedian to open up on a stage, and intertwine it with humor the way she did and pull it off, was stellar, and I learned about another side of her.

There were a few LOL moments, but I also caught myself with a perma-smile/grin when she was telling her stories. If alpha males turned into a woman for a day, they'd be Handler. I'm sure most women think like she does, but only she has the courage to hide nothing and say what's really on her mind, that that's what makes her special, relatable, unique, and hilarious.

Chelsea, thank you for being you, and the laughs you gave us in times like these. And if you're ever in the 416, ;p It's a well deserved 8/10 from me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":380,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"tv special,stand up comedy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1314546/","name":"Chelsea Handler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003474/","name":"Troy Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009221/"}],"duration":"PT1H8M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Green Lantern
Zelena svetiljka
programme.desc: Green Lantern: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard, Mark Strong. Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1133985/","name":"Green Lantern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTIxNzEtMzcxNC00NTUzLThkZjktMmJlYTcyMjBhMGUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1133985/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BigMaxAttacks"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"It wasn't that bad, why the hate?","reviewBody":"I saw Green Lantern with my son because it looked safe enough and I used to collect the comic books when I was a kid. I felt like I was the only guy over 20 at the theater, which I guess isn't surprising anymore. Did think there would be more adults, however, because the Green Lantern was something we read in my generation. Not sure if it's even around anymore. Being a fan of the comic book I had to go see it, and I was intrigued with the movie. After I got home I jumped on the computer and read the reviews. I was very disappointed with the professional reviews that cast stones at it, while at the same time, regular folk like myself thought it was a pretty good stab at the DC comic book version. I guess I look for something different when I go to the movies. I go to unwind and enjoy myself for a couple of hours, and Green Lantern worked for me."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-17","keywords":"comicbook movie,ring,spacecraft,alien,magical ring","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Lantern - 3D Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3445005593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. more Â»"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515116/","name":"Blake Lively"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765597/","name":"Peter Sarsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075528/","name":"Greg Berlanti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0973233/","name":"Marc Guggenheim"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

programme.title: Cars 2
Auti 2
programme.desc:
Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1216475, Title: Cars 2, --- Description: Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk","dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Witches
Vještice Roalda Dahla
programme.desc:
The Witches: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Chris Rock, Jahzir Bruno, Octavia Spencer, Brian Bovell. A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805647/","name":"The Witches","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYjlhMjEtYzIwOC00ZWYzLTgyMmQtYjI5M2UzNDJkNTU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805647/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please make these awful remakes stop.","reviewBody":"Oh Dear,

This should have been good, it needed to be good, sadly it just isn't. It's one of those films where a remake didn't seem to be necessary, but as someone that loved Roald Dahl as a child my interest was peaked.

It's inconsistent throughout, did they perhaps rush it because of Covid? The special effects look decent in parts, and woeful in others, Anne Hathaway displays personality it's fair to say, but her accent..... If anyone remembers Rentaghost, think Miss Popov, she spans countries from Ireland to Russia, it had me chuckling.

Once again, please, please try and give us something new and original, stop taking things that have already been made, and making them ten times worse. An extra point for casting the wonderful Josette Simon.

It made me want to watch Anjelica Huston.

I paid to download it, that money could have gone on something less awful, like a Donny Osmond cd.

Naff, 3/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"based on novel,witch,european literature on screen,taking off shoes,barefoot female","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1302249753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In late 1967, a young orphaned boy (Bruno) goes to live with his Grandma (Spencer) in the rural Alabama town of Demopolis. As the boy and his grandmother encounter some deceptively glamorous but thoroughly diabolical witches, she wisely whisks our young hero away to an opulent seaside resort. Regrettably, they arrive at precisely the same time that the world's Grand High Witch (Hathaway) has gathered her fellow cronies from around the globe to carry out her nefarious plans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0818055/","name":"Octavia Spencer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001804/","name":"Stanley Tucci"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1244069/","name":"Kenya Barris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
Ponos i predrasude
programme.desc:
Pride & Prejudice: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414387/","name":"Pride & Prejudice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3NTcyOTNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA0MzA4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three weddings and no funeral","reviewBody":"This quintessentially English film is utterly charming - a very traditional interpretation of Jane Austen's 1813 novel that manages to entertain, amuse and even move. First time director Joe Wright has worked with television playwright Deborah Moggach's script and a wonderful collection of mainly British actors to delight us. The versatile camera-work, luscious countryside, grand settings, period costumes, and atmospheric music are evidence of a work on which much love has been lavished.

At the heart of this triumph is the delightful 20 year old Keira Knightley as the assured and sharp Elizabeth Bennett, the second of five daughters looking to be married off by an anxious mother. Knightley's rise in the thespian firmament has been meteoric and this is her best performance to date in a role for which she is perfectly cast. Matthew MacFadyen is suitably brooding and gauche as Mr Darcy, but the cast list is enlivened with splendid British character actors, including Brenda Blethyn as Lizzie's irascible mother, Tom Hollander as a diminutive cleric seeking a wife, and Judi Dench as the formidable Lady Catherine, plus the Canadian Donald Sutherland (Lizzie's wise father).

This is a Georgian world in which social conventions present a veritable minefield for indiscretions or misunderstandings and in which a formal dance can be as intricate an occasion as international diplomacy. Pride and prejudice are only two of the obstacles to be overcome before inevitably true love brings Lizzie and her dark knight nose to nose (we don't even see a kiss). Passionate stuff indeed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":275936,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pride and prejudice,england,gentleman,bachelor,prejudice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pride & Prejudice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3045130521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595738/","name":"Deborah Moggach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

Shorta: Directed by Frederik Louis Hviid, Anders Ølholm. With Jacob Lohmann, Simon Sears, Tarek Zayat, Dulfi Al-Jabouri. Jens and Mike, two police officers on routine patrol, find themselves trapped in a maze of buildings when unrest spreads." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11081050/","name":"Shorta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlOGIzODQtMmQ5OC00NGMwLWJjY2UtOWVhOWIwODAwMmRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA2MDQ3MTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"Jens and Mike, two police officers on routine patrol, find themselves trapped in a maze of buildings when unrest spreads.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11081050/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"freddy_at_home"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie! Watch it on a weekend with beers and pizza","reviewBody":"I am one of those who are pretty tired of fake reviews. No need to make fake reviews about this movie, it's a pretty good movie without the "over the top" reviews made by some random crew or what ever.

It's not Judge Dredd (as some said) and it's not pumping action from start till end (also said) but it's a good solid quality Danish movie. A bit of a gangster feel, but not much really. If this had been an American movie, it would have been just another typical cop movie. But being a Danish movie, it's not like that and it feels a bit deeper.

You can read all about what it's about, so skipping all that. I think it was a good pizza-weekend-movie and it wasn't boring. It had a good story and good acting all over. This is no big CGI movie, and more of a character and story building movie. A big relevant story these days. I believed in it.

I liked it, so did my buds. We agreed on it being entertaining enough and it kept us off the phone. But, one or two almost cracked. Just almost... There really isn't anything new about this movie, that we haven't seen before. But as I wrote over here, being Danish. it gave a different feel about it.

Worth checking out! programme.title: Axios
programme.desc: Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. O'Neilll i Peltz rade s vodećim Axiosovim novinarima kako bi stavili naglasak na politiku, biznis i tehnologiju sljedećeg tjedna - kao i velike teme koje oblikuju budućnost. Svako izdanje AXIOS-a pokriva aktualni veliki problem iza kojeg slijede kratki dokumentarci, poučni intervjui s važnim osobama te pouzdani uvidi preneseni AXIOS-ovom tipičnom "inteligentnom jezgrovitošću" u sažetom, djeljivom formatu.

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra
Moj život s Liberaceom
programme.desc:
Behind the Candelabra: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Matt Damon, Scott Bakula, Eric Zuckerman, Eddie Jemison. A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1291580/","name":"Behind the Candelabra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0OTY2OTM0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTk4OTQ1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1291580/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sergeant_Tibbs"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally a film that suits Soderbergh's voyeuristic and clinical style.","reviewBody":"It's starting to look like 2013 is Soderbergh's year. Side Effects and Behind The Candelabra seem to be my favourite of his career so far, though that's only relatively, as I'm not a big fan of him. I do have Out Of Sight on my to see list coming up soon and I do need to give Traffic another watch before I make any final assessment on him. Although Soderbergh is frequently the director, cinematography and editor on his projects, he may be efficient but he's far too clinical, pushing the audience as an observer that it's difficult to feel emotionally involved in his films. I can't get excited for his half-baked premises that most likely haven't been fulfilled to their potential. However, Behind The Candelabra may be the first film I've seen of his that suits his style ideally. His style is still distant and voyeuristic, but in this bizarre world where Liberace adopts his lover for a son and pays for plastic surgery to make him look like himself, it feels more deliberate to keep us at a distance.

Instead, the scenes of dramatic conflict, decision and choice are played off for jokes and it's really effective, always earning belly laughs with its brilliant one-liners without feeling like it's silly. Perhaps its nervous laughter but it makes for an entertaining and interesting film. Michael Douglas is terrific as Liberace. I've never seen him take a character on like this. He's nearly up there with Sean Penn's Milk. It feels like it's been a while since Matt Damon has been in films I've wanted to watch and with this and Elysium, I've forgotten how reliable a lead he is. The characters inhabit a flashy world, but its kept on the costumes and sets which are incidental more than anything and the style of the film is kept subtle, besides a great choice of swooping cameras. It does have its flaws with nearly soap opera-esque structure and conflict but my expectations were very low so this is a pleasant surprise. I think I even prefer it to Side Effects.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42325,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2013-05-26","keywords":"pianist,gay adoption,boy toy,gay relationship,based on real person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi510240281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMDc4NTM2OTFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA2NTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMDc4NTM2OTFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA2NTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted. programme.title: Fahrenheit 451
Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc:
Fahrenheit 451: Directed by Ramin Bahrani. With Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Cindy Katz, Michael Shannon. In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0360556/","name":"Fahrenheit 451","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZGJkZDgtNzBlNS00YjkyLTk3NGEtZTIxMGVkMTk2Yjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0360556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"neener3707"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unfortunately Not So Good - Hit And Miss","reviewBody":"Though it was strong in a couple moments, for the most part I was disappointed with this, it really could ave been so much better, especially considering the immense resources of HBO. It goes back and forth between completely ridiculous to somewhat interesting. Unfortunately it is also a pale imitation to the novel its based on, only using the bare skeleton of the story, and not delving into what truly made the novel profound. Michael B. Jordan's character was so completely ridiculous and different than the novel version in the first 15 minutes that I nearly stopped watching it, but thankfully that subsides. There were many things from the book I expected to see, only to piss me off when they were either not there at all, or altered in some way for no justifiable reason. So while many of the basic plot points are there, tough some of them changed, it just didn't possess what the book did.

I did like Michael Shannon's character and his acting, and while Jordan's character is completely off-putting, it does get tolerable as the film goes on. There were a couple of meaningful discussions, but the essential meaning of the book burning is completely missed, it was to create a people void of free thought, and while that is hinted at, for the most part its nowhere near as deep and introspective as the novel, its a very basic rendering of and incredibly deep story. I for the most part was disappointed, it could have been so much better, all the had to do was pay attention to the source material, and not just scan over it. Also the re-writing of many of the characters is inconceivable to me, no idea why they would do it. 

Meh... I didn't like it very much.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19169,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-20","keywords":"dystopia,book burning,flamethrower,emoji,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young girl...and begins to rebel against society."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. Jordan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2210323/","name":"Aaron Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441654/","name":"Cindy Katz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1023919/","name":"Ramin Bahrani"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0618269/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001969/","name":"Ray Bradbury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1023919/","name":"Ramin Bahrani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0618881/","name":"Amir Naderi"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lorax
Lorax: Zaštitnik šume
programme.desc: The Lorax: Directed by Chris Renaud, Kyle Balda. With Danny DeVito, Ed Helms, Zac Efron, Taylor Swift. A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1482459/","name":"The Lorax","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTAwMjk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDI5NDc4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1482459/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"theantimonyelement"},"dateCreated":"2012-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sometimes change is a good thing...","reviewBody":"...in this case, changes from the book/original TV short. A lot of people have been lamenting the "frame story" this movie adds in, as well as the idea of making the Once-ler a human character. As far as the frame goes, it's done pretty well. It's a bit flat but perfectly enjoyable for younger kids. Making the Once-ler human, though? BRILLIANT. Hear me out. The original Once-ler was a faceless force of destruction, a shadowy embodiment of greed. This Once-ler is just a stupid kid with a dream, a guy who wants to change the world. He's not evil, but he lets his success get to his head, and that brings about his own downfall and the destruction of the forest. That's FANTASTIC, and here's why: that's how the world really is! Companies don't sit around all day cackling about how much smog they're pumping into the atmosphere; it's a process, and something that happened gradually. Obliviousness is just as dangerous as maliciousness, and that's a really powerful lesson. This can happen to YOU if you're not careful; anybody can hurt the planet if they don't pay attention. That's a rare lesson, and one I'm really pleased to see in this movie. \n\nSo, is it silly and stupid sometimes? Yes, of course. But it's colorful and exuberant, and in a lot of ways I think it really captured the "Seuss-ness" that similar remakes have missed. There's nothing offensive about it (besides the miserable marketing) and my little brother enjoyed it as a fun movie. I enjoyed it for giving us a deeper--and in my opinion, very powerful--character type: the accidental villain, the everydude who makes a horrible mistake that the environment suffers for. So take that as you will...but overall, I found myself liking this a lot more than I expected. Definitely worth a watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105886,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-03-14","keywords":"corrupt mayor,crooked mayor,heroine,betrayal,cat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Super Bowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1238212889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzY0MDY3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY3NzYzNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzY0MDY3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY3NzYzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1374980/","name":"Zac Efron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2357847/","name":"Taylor Swift"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000362/","name":"Danny DeVito"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719208/","name":"Chris Renaud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0049633/","name":"Kyle Balda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221986/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194770/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317450/","name":"Dr. Seuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666791/","name":"Cinco Paul"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0202425/","name":"Ken Daurio"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

Creed 2
programme.desc: Creed II: Directed by Steven Caple Jr.. With Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson, Phylicia Rashad. Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6343314/","name":"Creed II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmEyNWZhM2YtZDAyNi00ZjYzLWI2ZWMtOWM4ZmI1MDE0OWNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6343314/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Drago(nian) measures","reviewBody":"The uber villain from the Rocky franchises returns. Whoever watched the original Rocky movies will not forget Ivan Drago - also known as Dolph Lundgren in real life with an amazing performance that is literally as 1 dimensional as possible and still or rather because of that is in one of the best Rocky movies made. So it makes sense for him to return here and to reprise his iconic role, training his son to take on Creed.\n\nDumbing down again (evil as evil can be), he brings gravitas to the movie. Which does not quite reach the heights of the first Creed, but still is quite enjoyable. Especially with all the history contained in the movie. This should be a worthy closure to the Rocky saga - but you never know, do you?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116068,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2018-11-21","keywords":"baby,training montage,sequel,boxing match,boxer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi65124889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY0ZjVlMzEtYmI5MC00ZDAyLTgxZTctOWRjODczZTBiMjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY0ZjVlMzEtYmI5MC00ZDAyLTgxZTctOWRjODczZTBiMjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. programme.title: The Lion King
Kralj lavova
programme.desc:
The Lion King: Directed by Jon Favreau. With Chiwetel Ejiofor, John Oliver, James Earl Jones, John Kani. After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6105098/","name":"The Lion King","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwMjE1Nzc4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg4OTA1NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6105098/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"terry-46096"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Looks so good, has no heart.","reviewBody":"The movie is adequate, that's not good enough for this live action though. Lion King is a masterpiece story that has been celebrated for years for its emotional and timeless value. This version falls really short. The voice acting is flat the tone is wrong and there is little to no emotion felt during a very slow boring few hours.

The only highlight in my opinion is Seth Rohan and Billy Eisner. Past that? A very forgettable and hollow version of the story.

Oh and Beyoncé over sings everything.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":229055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-07-19","keywords":"remake of remake,lion,remake,africa,king","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Lion King","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3509369881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjE0NTMyZmMtOGQ2YS00MGZkLThkYjItZWRhMzYwMzRkZjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjE0NTMyZmMtOGQ2YS00MGZkLThkYjItZWRhMzYwMzRkZjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2255973/","name":"Donald Glover"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461498/","name":"Beyoncé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269463/","name":"Jon Favreau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008347/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091919/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0622288/","name":"Jeff Nathanson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0575293/","name":"Irene Mecchi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731271/","name":"Jonathan Roberts"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Arrival
Dolazak
programme.desc: Arrival: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg. A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2543164/","name":"Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExMzU0ODcxNDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE1OTI4MzAy._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2543164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SilentEyes_"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No CGI overkill, just some fine acting and directing","reviewBody":"Denis Villeneuve is without a doubt an upcoming director and I can't wait to see Blade Runner 2049. Prisoners, Sicario and now Arrival (haven't seen Enemy yet, or some of his earlier work). Denis knows how to capture the tension. It is almost the strongest point of all of his films. Minimal use of computer generated images, and main focus on story, characters, acting and thrilling scenes. Back on IMDb board, I have noticed a lot of people calling Arrival a boring movie. So many hypocrites these days. People trying to point out every possible flaw to look and sound smarter while at the same time hailing far worse movies. Calling it boring and slow while at the same time complaining no originality in Hollywood, only giant CGI laser explosions extravaganza. Go watch Independence Day. In Arrival there is no action, no explosions, just some amazing acting performances combined with good directing, editing and cinematography. There was not a single moment I felt bored.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647859,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-11-11","keywords":"alien contact,linguistics,linguist,nonlinear timeline,based on short story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225807897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist is recruited by the military to assist in translating alien communications."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898288/","name":"Denis Villeneuve"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2104063/","name":"Eric Heisserer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5384213/","name":"Ted Chiang"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="
